name: Gerald's Firefly Adventure!
description:
Play as Gerald and help him collect fireflies during a warm summer night! Be careful though, as summer nights also attracts a well known pest- mosquitos!! If you're bitten by a mosquito, it's game over for Gerald, and he'll be too itchy to go on!! How many fireflies can you catch before Gerald heads in for the night?

CONTROLS:

To move: Left & Right arrow keys
To jump: Up arrow key
To use net: Spacebar
